text: Uta Ranke-Heinemann (2 October 1927 in Essen - 25 March 2021) was a German theologian, academic and author. She held the (nondenominational) chair of History of Religion at the University of Duisburg-Essen in Essen, her birthplace."Church Bars 1st Woman Theologian", Reuters, June 20, 1987 Her father Gustav Heinemann was an SPD politician and president of Germany 1969â€“74. Ranke-Heinemann died on 25 March 2021, aged 93.Uta Ranke-Heinemann ist tot ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German academics Category:German Roman Catholics Category:German theologians Category:People from Essen Category:Politicians from North Rhine- Westphalia Category:Writers from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Uta Ranke-Heinemann
